textos.txt: I'm so tired, oh how tired I am.
It's been a long time, I hardly remember the last time I saw such youthfulness.
I imagine you must be very tired too, after all these challenges.
Take a seat, rest a little.
Tired? How can a requirement be tired?
Then again... it's not like anything is normal here.
Requirement? What a notion, I'm just a part of a...
All this talk, it's making me even more tired. Let's get straight to the point.
Considering that all the laboratories listed below are accredited under the NBR ISO/IEC 17025. Which alternative represents a NON-conformity based on the management system mentioned?

alternativas.txt: The AsdXy analysis laboratory adopts documented paper processes to ensure that all its services are carried out according to policies and technical procedures.
A small laboratory, due to having specific people for each task, does not control access to critical areas, since each employee has their designated workplace.
A laboratory ensures that the responsibilities and authorities for risk management are clearly assigned.
The AsdXy laboratory establishes and maintains procedures to control all documents that are part of its management system, but does not consider anything outside of it.
The AsdXy laboratory conducts internal audits once a year to verify compliance with the management system and identify areas for improvement.
